mapper.sql: id, name, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, description
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ${tblName} ( name, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, description ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{creator}, #{createDate}, #{lastModifier}, #{lastModDate}, #{description} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE dap_role
name = #{name},
creator = #{creator},
createDate = #{createDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
description = #{description},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE dap_role
name = #{map.name},
creator = #{map.creator},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
description = #{map.description},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dap_role ( name, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, description ) VALUES ( #{map.name}, #{map.creator}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.lastModifier}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.description} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM dap_role
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.id} , '%')
AND name like CONCAT('%', #{condition.name} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{condition.creator} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.createDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModifier} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModDate} , '%')
AND description like CONCAT('%', #{condition.description} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}

select
from dap_role
order by
${orderBy}
limit 0,1
